value: In January 2014 the United States State Department issued a travel warning to avoid non-essential travel to Agua Prieta after sunset, following a series of gun battles between rival cartel factions which resulted in multiple fatalities. Caution should also be exercised during the day, however, as shootouts have also most recently occurred in broad daylight (March 2014).
content=Great steaks and other Mexican food. The meat is family raised on a ranch in Southern Sonora. The steaks are about 500gm and the price is well below what you would pay in the USA.
